column1: Environmental Change and Global Sustainability - MSc (Agriculture and Forestry)
column5: Goal of the pro­grammeGlobal socio-ecological problems call for multidisciplinary solutions that transcend the usual boundaries of science and decision-making. The Environmental Change and Global Sustainability (ECGS) Master’s programme trains you in wide-ranging interdisciplinary thinking skills and provides you with the ability to:Study environmental and sustainability issues in your respective fields of expertise andSolve problems of socio-ecological sustainability in cooperation with various social actors.Further information about the studies on the Master's programme website.
